summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Utility Local Improvement District No. 6725 for the improvement of 9th Avenue from Alder to Jefferson Street, and from James Street to Seneca Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and necessary appurtenances; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 109285 and Section 2 of Ordinance 110824 to add two streets to the definition of the improvement, so that all streets improved are included.
